description: The National Cancer Institute has resources and information to help support you.

0.body:
Advocacy and support organizations
A searchable database of more than 100 organizations nationwide that provide emotional, practical, and financial support services for people with cancer and their families.
0.title: Support organizations

1.body:
Resources for patients
Authoritative information about your type of cancer as well as information on a wide range of cancer topics and the latest cancer research

Adolescents and young adults with cancer
What adolescents and young adults need to know after a cancer diagnosis.

Dictionary of Cancer Terms
Terms related to cancer and medicine.
1.title: Cancer information

2.body:
Resources for caregivers
Information to help you care for the cancer patient in your life â€”and yourself.
2.title: Caregivers

3.body:
Steps to find a clinical trial
Learn how to find the right clinical trial for you.

NCI-Supported clinical trials search
Search for trials for your particular kind of cancer.
3.title: Clinical trials
